attributes.action: Enforce judges to give custodial sentences for all animal cruelty offences.
attributes.additional_details: Animal lovers in the UK are incensed at the continued paltry suspended sentences imposed by judges to those who have caused deliberate harm , pain and death to animals in their care . The UK is supposed to have the highest standards in animal welfare. The insulting suspended sentences imposed by judges does not reflect this. 29/06/21 the maximum sentence for animal cruelty was increased from 6 months to 5 years . In the last four years not one single sentence of five years has been imposed .
attributes.background: Start imposing custodial sentences to all those individuals who have committed deliberate acts of cruelty against animals . Those of which that have resulted in the injury  ,death or necessary euthanisia of an animal by a vet ,to be given the maximum sentence of five years and a lifetime ban .
